a.n: Antonio Farao feat. Gregoire Maret - Moods

p.k: Antonio Farao and Gregoire Maret perform in a dynamic, multi-faceted collaboration of piano and mouth harp. Their program consists of original compositions and interpretations of jazz classics with a constant provision of space for improvisation.
p.d: Since its opening in 1992, jazz club Moods has developed into one of Zurich's largest and most prominent cultural venues. At the same time, it has become one of Europe's prominent jazz clubs which today enjoys a well-deserved worldwide reputation among musicians and critics. The venue books a large variety of genres, ranging from jazz and soul to electronic and international music. Antonio Farao and Gregoire Maret perform at Moods in a dynamic, multi-faceted collaboration of piano and mouth harp. Their program consists of original compositions and interpretations of jazz classics with a constant provision of space for improvisation.
